words.def: a humble request for help from someone in authority
a deep prolonged sound (as of thunder or large bells)
a wooden strip forming part of a fence
a light, self-propelled movement upwards or forwards
any of various primates with short tails or no tail at all
seed of a pea plant used for food
a close friend who accompanies his buddies in their activities
the upper side of the thighs of a seated person
a unit of length of thread or yarn
a general name for beer made with a top fermenting yeast
City in Papua New Guinea (Proper noun)
the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
an informal term for a father
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
